meanings.sent1: I remixed the colors to make a new one.
meanings.sent2: She remixed the song to make it sound better.
meanings.sent3: The chef remixed the ingredients to create a unique dish.
meanings.sent4: The artist remixed reality in his painting.
meanings.sent5: The DJ remixed the music, creating a fresh beat.

meanings.definition: To combine or edit existing recordings to produce a new version.
meanings.sent1: He remixed the video clips to make a movie.
meanings.sent2: They remixed the footage for a new documentary.
meanings.sent3: The students remixed their presentations for fun.
meanings.sent4: The editor remixed the scenes to tell a different story.
meanings.sent5: The producer remixed the tracks for a unique sound.

meanings.definition: A new version of a musical recording created by remixing.
meanings.sent1: The remixed album became a hit.
meanings.sent2: I love listening to remixed songs.
meanings.sent3: The remixed track added a fun twist to the party.
meanings.sent4: The remixed version of the song was even better.
meanings.sent5: The remixed CD had all my favorite songs.
